channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (1.3.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (22.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-requirements (1.5.2)
item.description: Package requirements checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: mccabe (0.7)
item.description: McCabe checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-simplify (0.15.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks for code that can be simplified
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pytest-flake8-v2 (1.1.1)
item.description: pytest plugin to check FLAKE8 requirements
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-force (0.0.1)
item.description: flake8 extension to force running check
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-wot (0.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks use of deprecated typing.List, typing.Dict, etc.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: autoflake8 (0.3)
item.description: Tool to automatically fix some issues reported by flake8 (forked from autoflake).
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-encodings (0.5)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to identify incorrect use of encodings.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-dunder-all (0.1.8)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin and pre-commit hook which checks to ensure modules have defined '__all__'.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-gl-codeclimate (0.1.5)
item.description: Gitlab Code Quality artifact Flake8 formatter.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.31)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.30)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-ls (1.8)
item.description: super fast flake8 language server
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (22.1.11)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pytest-flake8-path (1.2)
item.description: A pytest fixture for testing flake8 plugins.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-ls (1.7)
item.description: super fast flake8 language server
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-tidy-imports (4.6)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you write tidier imports.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-types (1.4)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban type hints.

item.title: Updated: flake8-no-pep420 (2.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban PEP-420 implicit namespace packages.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-comprehensions (3.8)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to help you write better list/set/dict comprehensions.
